problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Paul and Betty left the office together to get some lunch nearby. Paul didn't have another board meeting until 4, and so had plenty of time, but Betty was more rushed and needed to get back to the front desk to greet clients and answer phones within 30 minutes.
Question: Who serves on the board of directors?
ans0: Can't answer
ans1: Paul
ans2: Betty
